text: "Demons" is a 2013 song by American pop rock band Imagine Dragons and is the fourth single from their debut studio album Night Visions (2012). It went to the top 10 in Austria, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, the Czech Republic, Italy, Lebanon, Poland, Slovakia, Sweden, Switzerland and the United States. == Track listing == == References == Category:2013 songs Category:Imagine Dragons songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: Demons (Imagine Dragons song)
